Articles.Content:
I wasn't planning on this design working so I don't have many screenshots. My objective was to make an all LF SSTO. This happened while I was testing to see at what altitude the Nerv engine starts to become useful in terms of TWR and ISP. Turns out the answer is: much lower than expected, around 10km altitude. It Uses 2 Turboramjets and 2 Nerv's. The Nerv's are activated early to help squeeze more thrust out of the jets. It ends up going into low Kerbin orbit with around 1,700 m/s of Dv.

Imgur Album

Game crashing on re-entry is common, to fix this turn off temperature gauges with F10
